name: Dennis Lee SHEFFIELD, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation And Parole, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Sheffield v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Dennis Lee SHEFFIELD, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation And Parole, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of October, 2007, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice FITZGERALD dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
934 A.2d 1161
Dennis Lee SHEFFIELD, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS and Pennsylvania Board of Probation And Parole, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 24, 2007.
